name: superdweebie/authentication-module
description: Zend Framework 2 Module that provides authentication functionality

suggest.dojo/Sds: Contains a dojo based js client to consume the services of authenticationModule
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-mongo-odm-module: The default RememberMe service is set up to use Doctrine and Mongo
suggest.superdweeibe/doctrine-extensions-module: The default serializer is defined in this module
suggest.superdweebie/identity-module: The default identity model is defined in this module
